io.spine.server.entity

Interface WithLifecycle

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Entity<I,S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEntity, Aggregate, AggregatePart, CommandHandlingEntity, EntityRecordWithColumns, ProcessManager, Projection, TenantRepository.Entity, TransactionalEntity

    public interface WithLifecycle
    Something with LifecycleFlags.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.spine.server.entity.LifecycleFlags getLifecycleFlags()
      Obtains current lifecycle flags.
      default boolean isActive()
      Verifies if any of the lifecycle attributes is set.
      default boolean isArchived()
      Shows if current instance is marked as archived or not.
      default boolean isDeleted()
      Shows if current instance is marked as deleted or not.
      default io.spine.server.entity.LifecycleFlags lifecycleFlags()
      Obtains current lifecycle flags.

      • isActive

        default boolean isActive()
        Verifies if any of the lifecycle attributes is set.
        Returns:
        false if any of the attributes is set, true otherwise
